src:
Marcus Rashford Diklaim Berpotensi Flop Seperti Theo Walcott
04 Nov 2019, 19:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah prediksi dibuat Danny Mills terkait Marcus Rashford. Mills menilai inkonsistensi permainan Rashford bakal membuatnya menjadi pemain flop seperti Theo Walcott.
Sebelum akhir pekan kemarin, Rashford tengah menjadi sorotan. Ia tengah berada dalam kondisi onfire, terutama setelah ia membuat gol spektakuler ke gawang Chelsea di ajang Carabao Cup.
Namun pada akhir pekan kemarin, performa Rashford mendadak menurun drastis. Ia gagal memanfaatkan sejumlah peluang matang sehingga timnya kalah 1-0 di markas Bournemouth.
Mills tidak habis pikir dengan betapa inkonsistennya permainan Rashford. "Pada suatu saat ia [Rashford] menjadi pemain kelas dunia, namun di pertandingan berikutnya kecemerlangannya mendadak menghilang," ujar Mills kepada talkSPORT.

Baca komentar lengkap eks bek Manchester City itu di bawah ini.
text:
Marcus Rashford Claimed Potential Flop Like Theo Walcott
Nov 04 2019, 19:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A prediction made by Danny Mills regarding Marcus Rashford. Mills considers the inconsistency of Rashford's game to make him a flop player like Theo Walcott.
Before the weekend, Rashford was in the spotlight. He was on fire, especially after he made a spectacular goal against Chelsea in the Carabao Cup.
But at the weekend, Rashford's performance suddenly dropped dramatically. He failed to take advantage of a number of mature opportunities so that his team lost 1-0 at Bournemouth headquarters.
Mills could not understand how inconsistent the Rashford game was. "At one time he [Rashford] became a world class player, but in the next match his brilliance suddenly disappeared," Mills told talkSPORT.

Read the full comments of the former Manchester City defender below.
